name: Operation: Escort
description:
Operation: Escort is an action-strategy game, set in a dystopian future where humanity is forced to live in colonies and deliver supplies using robots. Play as a robotic delivery unit delivering important supplies between colonies. While you can not directly attack enemies, you can place bombs to defend yourself and all of your packages from rogue robots.

            As a delivery robot, you will be escorted by a robotic soldier that will be able to shoot at enemies. You can even direct the soldier to either follow you or attack nearby enemies. While the robotic soldiers are expendable, you are not. So ensure you deliver your packages safely so you can complete Operation: Escort.

Minimum System requirements:

Operating System: Windows 10

Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7500U CPU @ 2.70GHz

Memory: 12.0 GB

Graphics Card: Intel(R) HD Graphics 620

Storage: 504 MB

Controller Support: Keyboard ONLY
